bamleftalign.description: Left-aligns and merges the insertions and deletions in all alignments in stdin.  Iterates until each alignment is stable through a left-realignment step.

--fasta-reference.description: FASTA reference file to use for realignment (required)

--max-iterations.description: Iterate the left-realignment no more than this many times.

default.description: Default instance requires the users input for all files.
